field.name: CHANNEL_NUM
field.description: Protocol specific Channel Number for PLL Frequency Mapping

enumeratedValue.description: BLE channel number comes from the BLE Link Layer
BLE channel number comes from the CHANNEL_NUM register (BLE protocols 0 and 2)
BLE channel 39 is mapped to BLE channel 39, 2.480 GHz
BLE channel 39 is mapped to MBAN channel 39, 2.399 GHz
802.15.4 channel number comes from the 802.15.4 Link Layer
802.15.4 channel number comes from the CHANNEL_NUM register (802.15.4 protocols 4 and 5)

field.name: CT_FAIL
field.description: Real time status of Coarse Tune Fail signal

field.name: CTFF
field.description: CTUNE Failure Flag, held until cleared

field.name: CS_FAIL
field.description: Real time status of Cycle Slip circuit

field.name: CSFF
field.description: Cycle Slip Failure Flag, held until cleared

field.name: FT_FAIL
field.description: Real time status of Frequency Target Failure

field.name: FTW_RX
field.description: RX Frequency Target Window time select

field.name: FTW_TX
field.description: TX Frequency Target Window time select

field.name: FREQ_COUNT_FINISHED
field.description: Frequency Meter has finished the Count Time

field.name: HPM_SDM_IN_MANUAL
field.description: Manual High Port SDM Fractional value

field.name: HPM_CAL_ARRAY_SIZE
field.description: High Port Modulation Calibration Array Size

register.name: HPM_SDM_RES
register.description: PLL High Port Sigma Delta Results

field.name: LPM_D_CTRL
field.description: LPM Dither Control in Override Mode

field.name: LPM_SDM_USE_NEG
field.description: Use the Negedge of the Sigma Delta clock

register.description: PLL Low Port Sigma Delta Control 1

field.name: LPM_INTG_SELECTED
field.description: Low Port Modulation Integer Value Selected

field.name: HPM_ARRAY_BIAS
field.description: Bias value for High Port DAC Array Midpoint

field.name: LPM_INTG
field.description: Manual Low Port Modulation Integer Value
